img_text: Remoaner MP, Jeremy Lefroy isnt representing the people of Stafford. Join the local Conservative Association and deselect him! TMAKE THE CONSERVATIVES BLUE CONSERVATIVE AGAIN WAVE 57% IN STAFFORD VOTED LEAVE BUT REMOANER MP JEREMY LEFROY HAS TRIED TO FRUSTRATE THE WILL OF THE PEOPLE JOIN THE STAFFORD TORIES AND DESELECT HIM
